name: 許嘉裕
objective:
多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用於管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析。本課程內容包含複迴歸分析、因素分析、主成份分析、區別分析、多變量變異數分析、典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、結構方程式模式。
Multivariate analysis is to analyze multiple variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting, and so on. This scope of course includes Multiple Regression Analysis, Principal Component Analysis, Factor Analysis, Discriminate Analysis, Multiple Analysis of Variance, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Cluster Analysis, and Structural Equation Modeling.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Multivariate Statistical Analysis
Weeks 2-4 Regression Analysis & Logistic Regression
Weeks 5-6 Principle Component Analysis
Weeks 7-8 Factor Analysis
Week 9 Midterm Exam
Weeks 10-11 Discriminant Analysis (I)
Weeks 12-13 Cluster Analysis & Multidimensional Scaling
Week 14 Canonical Correlation
Weeks 15-16: MANOVA
Week 17 Structure Models
Week 18 Final project presentation
scorePolicy:
Paper presentation: 20%
Midterm Exam: 40%
Final Term Project: 40%
materials: Sharma, S., Applied Multivariate Techniques, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.,1996
